ygData.subject: Re: assasination question
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know about more than one Bayle list, but there is more than One Bayle...Antonious s brother, Kane, who has allied with the bloodsabers. this is almost
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know about more than one Bayle list, but there is more than One
Bayle...Antonious's brother, Kane, who has allied with the bloodsabers.

this is almost sounding to be like a movie =)

----------
> From: Dissonance <dissonance@...>
> To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_shadowknights] assasination question
> Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 2:43 PM
>
> From: "Dissonance" <dissonance@...>
>
> Greetings Brother of the Shadows,
> Well, I don't know of the quest you are trying to complete, or if this
> information has changed any, but I know of a "friend" of mine in Qeynos
> who
> happens to be a Paladin of the Temple of Thunder. She had orders from
> her guild
> leader, Runethar Hamest (spelling?) to go to Surefall Glade in the
> Jaggedpines
> and get the Bayle List from one of the Rangers there (name
> forgotten-easy to
> find, but evil is killed on sight) However, upon arriving, she finds
> that the
> Bayle list has been eaten, along with the Ranger's son (snicker) by the
> great
> Mammoth Beast of the Pines. My "friend" knows of an entrance to the
> cave where
> the mammoth lives, but it's from inside Surefall. By the way, the
> Mammoth is a
> huge bear. And Antonius Bayle hired the Temple of Thunder to deliver the
> list to
> him, because he doesn't trust his own guards. That's what I know of the
> Bayle
> list. It could be that someone or something killed the mammoth, or the
> quest
> just suddenly changed, or perhaps there's more than one Bayle list
> wandering
> about, I don't know. Just thought maybe this could be of some help. May
> Innoruuk
> guide your hatred.
> Look for me on Tunare,
>
> Envy
> La Comtesse de Obscuritï¿½
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
